website_summaries.verdict: A reliable thermometer for measuring oven temperature from 150ºF to 600ºF.
pros: One of the easier thermometers to hang, it gets high marks for accuracy and large-print numbering
cons: At 2.5" wide, the dial is relatively small, and the black type may be hard to read through a blackened oven door

customer_reviews.title: Junk.
customer_reviews.text: A pice of junk. I used it *once* to check the accuracy of my new oven. It went to 450 degrees and stayed there, forever. I had to throw it away. Spend a little more for a better thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: Divamac

customer_reviews.title: do not buy
customer_reviews.text: i wasn't crazy about these when i bought them and posted a review. but now i want to revise it. these things are JUNK and do not work. they never did work right and now they're not working at all. find a different brand! you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Toni A. Ritchey

customer_reviews.title: Best oven thermometer to buy!
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through several oven thermometers, including the CDN, Model EOTI. I even bought a new oven (Wolf Professional gas) because my old oven (Viking) was so unreliable and I also hated cleaning it. I thought it was the oven as the portable thermometer never went above 350. I had bought the CDN one just before buying a new oven and then decided to buy a new AcuRite to compare. When I set the new oven to 425 degrees, the AcuRite registered exactly 425 degrees. The CDN registered 350 degrees. My puff pastry came out perfectly. So, I'll stay with the new AcuRite and throw away the CDN. Sorry Cook's Illustrated!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: As inaccurate as they come - waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This thing is very inaccurate. Reads whatever it wants. I tested it in my oven and it kept going up. My oven temperature was set at 325 but this read 450... My cake would've burnt if that was the accurate reading. Unfortunately I didn't save the packaging, otherwise I would have sent it back. Do not recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Ivette

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again for myself or as  gift.
customer_reviews.text: I like this thermometer because it’s marked and you set the little black arrow to the desired temperature. Very easy to see with over 50 vision issues. I do admit I have to get close or pull it out quick to see but it’s much easier with the bolder color.
customer_reviews.author: Tammyh

customer_reviews.title: Extremely EASY to READ!!
customer_reviews.text: Very large numbers which makes it very easy to read especially for us SENIORS!! This thermometer can either sit on top of the rack or hang from it. As far as accuracy, all I can say is that the readings matched my previous thermometer. Only slight negative is that it only has Fahrenheit readings. Centigrade readings would be nice, but fortunately, the conversion is easy.
customer_reviews.author: Ama Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: I suspected my oven was not getting hot enough and was off, but apparently I was wrong. This little thermometer gives me the same reading as I have programmed into the oven. So I guess all is okay. (I think we all have to bake our cookies a little bit longer. 😗) All seems to be fine with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solved our temperature dilemma!
customer_reviews.text: We couldn't figure out what was wrong with the oven in our new house. I couldn't figure out why the temperature wouldn't rise about 350. Come to find out nothing was wrong with our oven at all, but the old thermometer was broken! This one is accurate and saved us from constantly adjusted our oven temp when we didn't need to.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read, well made.
customer_reviews.text: Got this before Thanksgiving so I could "set" the new thermostat knob I had good for my Jenn Aire oven. Turned out no adjustments needed. I placed this on center oven shelf, set my over to 300, 350, and 450, and temperature readings exactly matched each time! Easy to read, with built in hook, to hang on shelf if desired.
customer_reviews.author: BarryL

customer_reviews.title: Packing issues
customer_reviews.text: Thermometer works great. My issues aren’t with the product so I gave it the stars it deserves. My issue is with packaging - well, more with choosing the specific item to pack. It arrived looking like it had been run over - dirt ground into the plastic packaging and the clip piece for hanging at the top of the thermometer was completely crushed so not usable. This is damage that would’ve been completely visible to the person packing it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: super!
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked at how accurate my oven temperatures are, this thermometer is consistent so I know it's correct, easy to read through my old oven glass door which is as clean as I can get it, meaning not perfect by any means.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Grace

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: I had trouble with temperature in sons oven .seemed like everything burned.Purchased thermometer and easy to use and solved my problem right away. Oven runs very hot and had to adjust for it.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Jo

customer_reviews.title: Not Accurate, Not Right
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to monitor the temperature controls on my smoker. Long story short, the thermometer was off by 50 degrees Fahrenheit. The variance was identified by using infrared measuring devices and thermal resistors.
customer_reviews.author: MHall

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: 25 degrees off (low) - Tested in oven with calibrated Fluke 52II Digital Thermometer and K-Type thermal-couple.
customer_reviews.author: Scott G. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: continues to fall off easily.
customer_reviews.text: No improvement over old one as far as reading temp; continues to fall off easily.
customer_reviews.author: vagabond

customer_reviews.title: Bought to replace old thermometer that gave very inaccurate readings ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace old thermometer that gave very inaccurate readings. After installing, kept having problems with my oven temperature and finally discovered this new thermometer not working accurately as well! A dud.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT waste your money on this piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an oven thermometer to check the accuracy of my oven settings. My oven was set for 425. This thermometer read 600!! After it cooled off, I see the dial is at 180 without any way to calibrate it. Not worth the trouble to send it back. It's going in the trash!
customer_reviews.author: Dwight Duke

customer_reviews.title: TOO SLOW, DIDN'T READ LOW TEMPS
customer_reviews.text: This would have been a great oven thermometer if it had worked as advertised. It didn't read the low temps on the dial at all. It did finally read the high temps, but it took too long to do so, getting there only well after the oven had shut off and you wanted to put food into it. The oven dial was wonderfully easy to read and decipher quickly, so it's a shame it simply couldn't be utilized.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: It works well.
customer_reviews.text: It does it's job perfectly well. The only issue I have, which is not a design flaw of this product at all, but the fact that you are hanging it on a rack inside the oven. In order to read it, you have to open the oven, let heat out and bend over and put your face near the heat in order to read it. It's just a nature of this type. I might like one that you can read from outside the oven in the future, but this works fine for now.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: I like this
customer_reviews.text: I like this and it seems very accurate. I have a house with old vintage double ovens from the 60’s and I knew they weren’t very accurate and this helps so much. My sister said she needed one so I ordered another one for her. Very speedy delivery also in these.
customer_reviews.author: terri

customer_reviews.title: Nice gage
customer_reviews.text: I have an old gas oven, probably from the 40’s, and the wiggle in the oven knob is enough to be off +/-20-30 degrees. It’s nice to be able to dial in the temperature more accurately.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Useless!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this oven thermometer because I my oven runs too hot and my baked goods and other foods are getting burned. And yet according to this thermometer, my oven is 50 degrees below what it should be! I set the oven to 350 and the thermometer indicated 300 degrees. I'm sending this useless gadget right back.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Works great but it showed up bent
customer_reviews.text: I took photos, but can't show them; no option. Packaging thin, no support plastic. I tried to rebend the AcuRite ther. but you can tell its not flat.
customer_reviews.author: Jillbert

customer_reviews.title: Worked at first but didn't hold up
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine but let oven juices inside which obscured dial settings, rendering it useless.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still not sure what my oven temp is!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 different highest rated oven thermometers because my oven seems off. Between the oven built in thermometer, this oven thermometer and the other oven thermometer I have a range of 50 degrees between the 3! So which one is right?
customer_reviews.author: Steve R.

customer_reviews.title: Big numbers
customer_reviews.text: I can read the numbers without wearing my glasses. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Wind Chime

customer_reviews.title: Supremely help. Finally a step to helping me towards my broken oven
customer_reviews.text: I totally know the correct temperature for my oven. I just started baking and nothing is worse than getting everything right but the goods not turning out cooked/baked. Turns out wasn't me or me just raising the temperature by 20 degrees as preheating goes(thank goodness) it was the ovens fault now I know to adjust mine 320 degrees more. Ridiculous I know. I also purchase another item one of those baking iron thumbtack looking things to help even out the center so the sides are completely back by the time the center is actually baked.
customer_reviews.author: SIMON TSUI

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: I bought a small stove which costs twice as much as the average size. No bells or whistles, not even a temperature gauge for the oven. This thing works great hanging in my little cute oven.
customer_reviews.author: victoria g.

customer_reviews.title: OVEN THERMOMETER BIG HELP
customer_reviews.text: My numbers on my oven knob faded. Had difficulty reading temp settings. This worked great to locate the 350 degree setting. Super accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't read any temperature above 350 degrees. Set oven for 400 it reads 350. Set oven to 450 it reads 350. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Blade Runner

customer_reviews.title: Does the job but could be engineered better
customer_reviews.text: Needs a sturdier base doesn't want to sit still in the oven. Just when I want to read it I can't see it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution to my oven temperature problems.
customer_reviews.text: I like the large easy to read numbers. Perfect view from outside my oven door. My oven is always the perfect temperature for my recipes now.
customer_reviews.author: Renita

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Works great checking temps in an outdoor grill. Easy to read large numbers.
customer_reviews.author: Natures Retreat

customer_reviews.title: I don’t find it accurate
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how accurate this is. Seems to read way lower than the oven temp but when I’m baking something, it comes out perfect if I go by my oven reading and not this thermometer reading.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: This came with a broken glass on the front 🤨I need it for the holidays and it should be replaced by seller. Can’t return it as it’s too close to the time I am really depending on an acurate reading
customer_reviews.author: Margot Martin

customer_reviews.title: Functions Accurately
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Just little hard to read when looking through oven door.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: This oven thermometer is inaccurate. In repeated tests against other thermometers, it consistently registered 20 degrees too high. It should not be relied upon for baking.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Anything but Acurate
customer_reviews.text: This was very slow to respond and never got within 25° of the correct temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Old Moose

customer_reviews.title: Oven Thermometer matches oven thermostat.
customer_reviews.text: The Oven Thermometer seems accurate to the oven settings! But it arrived with the stand bent. I fixed it; just that a New in-the-Box protected item shouldn't be sent as $New if it is damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Sally M.

customer_reviews.title: Temperature 🌡 Guage
customer_reviews.text: The house I rent doesn't have a working temperature 🌡 gauge, helps me use my oven, by displays temperature
customer_reviews.author: gregornot

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice accurate also you may hang on oven shelves along with setting on rack.
customer_reviews.author: SLChavez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't see the old one. This one is large enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Carl N. Graves

customer_reviews.title: Read 50 degrees higher than actual temp!
customer_reviews.text: I had a very old thermometer I was using to calibrate my oven thermostat. Wanted a second opinion so bought this one. With oven set at 425, the two were 50 degrees apart. So I bought a third one, CDN DOT2 ProAccurate Oven Thermometer – Large Dial, Stainless Steel, NSF Certified. The old one and the CDN matched exactly, and this one was 50 degree higher than both. Got a refund. I'd go with the CDN.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Froze after 4 uses
customer_reviews.text: after using this product it is now stuck at 250 degs.
customer_reviews.author: Fredrick H.

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: The oven thermometer confirmed that the oven was heating correctly. It seemed to be perfectly accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Educator

customer_reviews.title: easy to hang in the oven
customer_reviews.text: Readable and clear, easy to hang in the oven. Good replacement for my old one with teeny numbers.
customer_reviews.author: N. Alonso Hathaway

customer_reviews.title: Must Have
customer_reviews.text: This was a hundred degrees different from the door-insert thermometer in my propane smoker. I'm thinking the AcuRite is probably the more accurate of the two. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: CindyTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: These old eyes still had hard time reading and they ...
customer_reviews.text: These old eyes still had hard time reading and they need to make with bigger stand always falling down to bottom of oven
customer_reviews.author: Doris gilkey

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thermometer on 12/28/17 and in just a little over a year later, all the numbers had fallen out of place and were scrambled. Thus, it was was impossible to read or use.
customer_reviews.author: Amy M. Kobe

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: When set at the desired temperature my oven burnt everything, I used the readings on this AcuRite gauge to adjust my oven temperature and there is no more burning. Judging by the meals I have made since the adjustment, I would say it is accurate.
customer_reviews.author: ValueGuy

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and easy to read!
customer_reviews.text: Love the accuracy of this thermometer. Makes baking in my old stove easier!!
customer_reviews.author: L. E. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate. Easy to read. Can be knocked off the rack if you aren’t careful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The background turned dark gray after a couple of batches ...
customer_reviews.text: The background turned dark gray after a couple of batches of cookies. I'm not sure how accurate it is because I can't read it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarra

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Transparent Dial helps readability when squinting through the oven door toward the light source. Clear graphics.
customer_reviews.author: Solar Reigns

customer_reviews.title: Veary easy to read due to large numbers
customer_reviews.text: Veary easy to read due to large numbers. Can read even thru oven door window. Price was right. Even with stove light on I had to use a flashlight to read old one. Acurate also.
customer_reviews.author: Don E Anderson

customer_reviews.title: LARGE numbers -fast read.
customer_reviews.text: LARGE numbers make it easy to read fast so don't have to keep the oven door open long. Sturdy / High quality.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: would never buy your item again...
customer_reviews.text: did not keep the right temp. set oven for 350, but the thermometer read 400 had oven checked and it was right on with mfg. testing....they said thermometer was reading was wrong, so must be damaged some how...
customer_reviews.author: Magdalen McBride

customer_reviews.title: exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I have an iffy oven and this helps make it less iffy.
customer_reviews.author: moonwomanone

customer_reviews.title: now I know why my oven burns everything----thanks to this ...
customer_reviews.text: now I know why my oven burns everything----thanks to this thermometer, I know that my oven runs 35 degrees too high
customer_reviews.author: Watchful Reader

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Needed to check my smoker temps. Matches within 1 degree my electric probes
customer_reviews.author: David E

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our needs, and numbers are large enough to see through the glass door. Turns out my oven temperature is spot on!
customer_reviews.author: Lia G.

customer_reviews.title: Yup, it keeps temp.
customer_reviews.text: It's a thermometer. It monitors temperatures. Is there a version that sings and dances?
customer_reviews.author: VB

customer_reviews.title: Nice big numbers
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a thermometer I can actually read in the oven! Nice big numbers. Very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Melwel

customer_reviews.title: complete garbage
customer_reviews.text: Cheap junk. Glass shattered after only a week of use.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Shields

customer_reviews.title: Works great and the price can't be beat.
customer_reviews.text: Found out my oven was running about 20 degrees off; at least now I know why my cake fell.
customer_reviews.author: B from DC

customer_reviews.title: Works well for about a year.
customer_reviews.text: Works for about a year. Then it is not very accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Louise1977

customer_reviews.title: Great oven thermometer.
customer_reviews.text: Really helped me regulate my oven. My cakes turn out better!
customer_reviews.author: Jbinjamul

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Used it to check the temp of my oven. Was spot on - so either both are accurate or both are wrong!
customer_reviews.author: JoLR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Literally the cheapest oven thermometer on Amazon the day I searched for one, but it does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Roman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This one seems to be accurate and is readily readable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The first thermometer i bought broke while removing from the package from a Target store
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to read if your oven does not have light and the it is very accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin E Darby

customer_reviews.title: Thanks!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, never trust your oven's thermometer. My suspicions were confirmed when I received this thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, suspect our oven was off 15 Degrees, this oven thermometer proved it.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Good thing to own
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used yet can’t rate accuracy but other things as rated.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley F.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: just perfect for cooking my oven is old and this help me cook at the right Temp
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Useful and priced right.
customer_reviews.text: Am hardly surprised that it works - the brand is reliable. Although our Frigidaire oven's control seems to be right on target, the thermometer seems to be surprisingly useful in mapping temperature distribution with the oven's volume, or for measuring the relative effect of a baking stone (it's surprising.) Very much worthwhile and certainly affordable. A necessity for ensuring oven reliability for temp-sensitive baking, such as for breads and several meats.
customer_reviews.author: John Popp

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my outdoor oven and it works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Haider

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: now I can see the temp. with those big numbers

customer_reviews.title: This thermometer was easy to read as the numbers are big.
customer_reviews.text: This is an oven thermometer whose numbers started falling off after 2 months of use. I can't return it because I missed the window of return by two days. Don't buy it, it's faulty and its now useless as I can't read the numbers anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It is good to be able to see the temperature.

customer_reviews.title: Shows the tempature too hot.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to read but shows the temperature too high all the time. At least 25 degrees too hot.

customer_reviews.text: Don't waste a cent. It is at least 20 degrees off.

customer_reviews.text: I didn't know how 'off' my oven was until I began using this.

customer_reviews.text: It keeps falling down when I move the rack even when I adjust it...

customer_reviews.text: Pleasant transaction. I do wonder if the temp is accurate.

customer_reviews.title: Everything was great. Delivered as promised
customer_reviews.text: Everything was great. Delivered as promised. Quality of items great. Ease of ordering great Always pleased with ordering from Amazon! Thank You!!!

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I will likely return this item. The backing or sticker that has the numbers is crooked so whatever the arrow would point to would not even be correct.

customer_reviews.title: just got to use for first time. Oven set ...
customer_reviews.text: just got to use for first time. Oven set for 350 old therm reading 346 Deg. ( I thought it was off) new therm won't go higher then 300 Deg. put oven at 370 old reading 360 new term won't go higher then 300.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product at a good price. Recommended. Easy to read on the oven.

customer_reviews.text: it does reach the same temperature as my love, but unfortunately takes three times as long as the oven. i will not buy this (or any other brand of this type) again.

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly great............
customer_reviews.text: I like the easy-to-read numerals. My impression, however, is that this thermometer is Very Slow to react to rising temperatures. When my oven 'says' that it has reached the desired temperature, the thermometer does not agree. So this is not what I was hoping for, but I really don't know what to do about it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn M. Young

product_meta.title: AcuRite 00620A2 Stainless Steel Oven Thermometer, 1, Silver
feature_bullets: Oven and grill safe for leave-in use while cooking
Measures temperatures from 150 to 600 degrees Fahrenheit
Durable, stainless steel construction with protective glass lens
Integrated hanger for easy mounting or stands upright on base

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars675 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
